statements: SELECT * FROM vm_configuration WHERE vm_id = 1;
SELECT vm_name, vm_os FROM vm_configuration WHERE vm_cpu_cores > 2;
SELECT vm_id, vm_memory_gb FROM vm_configuration WHERE vm_os = 'Linux';
SELECT vm_name, vm_memory_gb, vm_cpu_cores FROM vm_configuration WHERE vm_memory_gb <= 32;
SELECT * FROM vm_configuration ORDER BY vm_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM vm_configuration WHERE vm_memory_gb > 16 ORDER BY vm_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vm_name, vm_os FROM vm_configuration WHERE vm_cpu_cores BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT DISTINCT vm_os FROM vm_configuration WHERE vm_memory_gb < 8;
SELECT vm_id, vm_name, vm_memory_gb, vm_os FROM vm_configuration WHERE vm_os LIKE '%Windows%' ORDER BY vm_memory_gb ASC;
SELECT vm_id, vm_cpu_cores FROM vm_configuration WHERE vm_memory_gb IN (8, 16, 32);
SELECT * FROM vm_config;
SELECT vm_id, vm_name, vm_memory_gb FROM vm_config;
SELECT vm_name, vm_storage_gb FROM vm_config ORDER BY vm_storage_gb DESC;
SELECT vm_name, vm_memory_gb FROM vm_config WHERE vm_memory_gb > 4;
SELECT vm_id, vm_name, vm_storage_gb, vm_memory_gb FROM vm_config WHERE vm_storage_gb < 100 AND vm_memory_gb > 2;
SELECT * FROM vm_config WHERE vm_memory_gb > 8;
SELECT vm_name, vm_memory_gb FROM vm_config WHERE vm_storage_gb BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT vm_name, network_name FROM vm_config JOIN vm_network ON vm_config.vm_id = vm_network.vm_id;
SELECT vm_name, network_name FROM vm_config JOIN vm_network ON vm_config.vm_id = vm_network.vm_id WHERE vm_memory_gb < 16;
SELECT vm_name, vm_memory_gb FROM vm_config WHERE vm_id IN (SELECT vm_id FROM vm_network WHERE network_name = 'Production');
SELECT * FROM VirtualMachines;
SELECT name, ip_address, os_version FROM VirtualMachines WHERE memory_gb > 8;
SELECT id, name, ip_address, storage_gb FROM VirtualMachines WHERE storage_gb < 500;
SELECT id, name, ip_address, os_version, memory_gb, storage_gb FROM VirtualMachines WHERE os_version IS NOT NULL;
SELECT vm_id, cpu_cores, ram_gb, storage_type FROM VMConfigurations WHERE cpu_cores >= 4;
SELECT * FROM VirtualMachines WHERE memory_gb > 8;
SELECT id, name, ip_address FROM VirtualMachines WHERE os_version IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT v.name, v.ip_address, c.cpu_cores, c.ram_gb, c.storage_capacity_gb FROM VirtualMachines v INNER JOIN VMConfigurations c ON v.id = c.vm_id;
SELECT v.name AS vm_name, n.network_name, n.subnet FROM VirtualMachines v LEFT JOIN VMNetworks n ON v.id = n.vm_id WHERE v.storage_gb > 200;

SELECT v.id, v.name, c.cpu_cores, c.ram_gb, n.network_name FROM VirtualMachines v LEFT JOIN VMConfigurations c ON v.id = c.vm_id LEFT JOIN VMNetworks n ON v.id = n.vm_id WHERE v.ip_address LIKE '192.168%';
SELECT * FROM virtual_machines;
SELECT vm_name, vm_memory_gb FROM virtual_machines WHERE vm_storage_gb > 100;
SELECT user_id, username, user_email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT vm_id, config_name, config_value FROM configurations WHERE vm_id = 1;
SELECT network_name, subnet FROM networks WHERE network_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM virtual_machines WHERE vm_id = 1;
SELECT vm_name, vm_memory_gb, vm_storage_gb FROM virtual_machines WHERE vm_storage_gb > 500;
SELECT u.username, u.user_email, vm.vm_name FROM users u INNER JOIN virtual_machines vm ON u.user_id = vm.vm_id;
SELECT vm.vm_name, c.config_name, c.config_value FROM virtual_machines vm INNER JOIN configurations c ON vm.vm_id = c.vm_id WHERE c.config_name = 'OS';
SELECT n.network_name, n.subnet, vm.vm_name FROM networks n INNER JOIN virtual_machines vm ON n.network_id = vm.vm_id;
SELECT * FROM virtual_machines;
SELECT vm_name, vm_os FROM virtual_machines WHERE vm_cpu_cores > 4;
SELECT id, vm_name, vm_os FROM virtual_machines ORDER BY vm_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM vm_networks WHERE network_name LIKE 'Private%';
SELECT vm_id, disk_name, disk_size_gb FROM vm_disks WHERE disk_size_gb >= 100;
SELECT * FROM virtual_machines;
SELECT vm_name, vm_os, vm_cpu_cores FROM virtual_machines ORDER BY vm_cpu_cores DESC;
SELECT vm_name, vm_memory_mb FROM virtual_machines WHERE vm_memory_mb > 4096;
SELECT vm_name, network_name FROM virtual_machines INNER JOIN vm_networks ON virtual_machines.id = vm_networks.vm_id;
SELECT vm_name, disk_name, disk_size_gb FROM virtual_machines INNER JOIN vm_disks ON virtual_machines.id = vm_disks.vm_id WHERE disk_size_gb BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
